PrecisEnactment of the INDIANS AND BANDS ON CERTAIN INDIAN SETTLEMENTS REMISSION ORDER (1997) - which provides for the remission of the income tax and the Goods and Services Tax paid or payable by an Indian living on an Indian Settlement where those taxes exceed the amount that would have been payable if the Indian Settlement were a reserve.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1997-0127 Publication Date: 1997-11-12
